query:
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.code, 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM turmas t WHERE t.programId = p.id) as turmas,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alunos a WHERE a.programId = p.id) as alunos
FROM programs p ORDER BY p.id;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kPX7CjhqdMFT8y.9c22f9f54902 --database 5n7arrGNHjNdoFCMzyGXcY --execute 
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.code, 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM turmas t WHERE t.programId = p.id) as turmas,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alunos a WHERE a.programId = p.id) as alunos
FROM programs p ORDER BY p.id;
